answers.answer: Have you discussed your concern with you doctor. I never had an ultrasound with my previous pregnancies until 20wks but I also wasn't high risk. Some physicians wait until then if your insurance only covers one but if you have a medical reason for more than most insurances will pay for more so long as the doctor tells them its medically necessary

question: im currently.20wks n 4 days pregnant. i have not had an ultra sound n am high risk because of my diabetes. i have appt tomm for physical ,i hope they give me an ultrasound cuz at this point im becomming fusterated n upset....how come i havnt had an ultrasound n im five months now this makes no sense n.im highrisk....someone help!!!
title: 5 months pregnant (no ultrasound) :/
